app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps PhotoGrid Video Collage Maker
app_description: Your handy Video Collage Maker PhotoGrid Video does for videos what PhotoGrid does for photos. The best Collage App for you to create stunning videos for social media! PhotoGrid Video is an easy to use video collage maker! With the video merger you can create a stunning photo and video collage in seconds! You merely need to pick photos or videos to collage then add adjustable layouts with music text stickers and background! Create your own video collages for free now. Fabulous feature Free collage app for collage video and photo together 300 stylish layouts Supports up to 9 videos collage Supports up to 16 photos collage Resizable photos videos Makes a video collage with beautiful patterns or colors background 300 free background music Shares with your friends of TikTok IG FB easily Adds text on video in seconds Supports 1000 fancy fonts Supports crop video feature Supports multiple ratios Professional Video Collage Up to 9 videos montages Create 2 9 video collages for free in seconds with our grid feature. Get inspired with a wide variety of grid layouts. Collaging should be relaxing and fun! Built for sharing on Instagram and Facebook now! Mix up videos with photos Supports up to 9 photos and videos letting you easily collage photos and videos without effort! Allows you to combine all your holiday memories into one video. Let creating photo and video montages become a real pleasure for your Instagram posts. 1000 materials and fonts A variety of backgrounds stickers and text fonts to choose from! Basic text functions are for free you can apply color bold italic to the text change text backgrounds and replace fonts. Enjoy! If you have any questions or suggestions please feel free to contact us via video.collage.app gmail.com
